s.description: This is a sample for hatool's scripting engine, used to demonstrate some of its features
s.name: Sample Hatool script

steps.say: Hi, I'm the Online Investing Virtual Assistant, I can help you with your online investing questions.
Are you new to online Investing with BMO or do you have an account with us?

options.show: I'm new to online investing with BMO
I have an existing online investing account

steps.say:
Happy to help. BMO InvestorLine online investing services offer independent investors excellent service and fast trade execution for a wide range of investments. Our competitive rates and professional level tools are designed to give you easy access to online investing.

Would you like to learn more about online investing at BMO?

options.show: Yes CLICK HERE
What else can you help me with ?

options.show: I'd like to learn more about your online Investing platforms
I'd like to talk to someone about online investing at BMO

steps.say: I can help you with that

I want to learn more about online Investing

steps.say: Great, can you tell me a little bit more about you're looking for?

options.show: How do I move money between my BMO InvestorLine account and my existing BMO bank account?
How do I move money if I don't bank with BMO?
How do I transfer an existing investment account to BMO adviceDirect?
How long does it take to transfer assets into my account?
How do I transfer from my Self-Directed account into my adviceDirect account?
How do I deposit a physical share?

steps.say:
You can easily make deposits/contributions and withdrawals all online. Just sign in and select on Move Money.

If you're using the 2.0 experience, you can find Move Money on the homepage under your account details.

This can take 1-2 business days.

Log In

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

If you bank online with any other financial institutions, you can set up BMO InvestorLine as a bill payee and entering your 8-digit BMO InvestorLine account number. You can then send funds from your bank account just as you would pay an online bill. This can take 3-5 business days.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

You must submit an Authorization to Transfer form. By signing into your account, select Move Money - Transfer Accounts, our site will guide you on whether your transfer request is eligible for electronic sibmission or if a manual form is required.

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

Your transfer times vary depending on the institution and the investments being transferred. Here are our general guidelines for approximate transfer times once documentation is received:

    Within BMO:
  • BMO Nesbitt Burns:1 to 2 weeks
  • BMO Bank of Montreal:Cash or mutual funds:2 to 3 weeks
  • Guaranteed Investment Certificates (GICs):4 to 6 weeks
    ATON-Eligible Institutions:
  • Brokers using ATON(Account Transfer Online Notification):2 to 3 weeks (transfers of mutual funds may take longer)
    Non-ATON:
  • Non-ATON brokers:3 to 4 weeks GICs, Quebec savings bonds, mutual funds, and physical certificates may take longer
  • Pension transfer:6 to 8 weeks

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

In cash - you can easily move cash between your InvestorLine account using the Move Money tab. If you're using the 2.0 experience, you can find Move Money on the homepage under your account details. This can take 1-2 business days.

In-Kind - to move securities between your InvestorLine accounts be call in to an advisor to provide Instructions. This can take 1-2 business days.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

The recommended method of sending securities is via a courier or by priority post which typically takes two to three days to deliver. You may also send via registered mail, however delivery time is much longer and could take up to two weeks.
Security certificates should be sent to:
Attn:BMO InvestorLine
Transit#3973
First Canadian Place
100 King St. W., Floor B1
Toronto, ON M5X1H3

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day
Great, can you tell me a little bit more about what you're looking for?

options.show: How long does it take for a trade to settle?
Can I settle my trades in either Canadian or US currency?
Can I place a trade Immediately following a deposit request?
What type of orders can I place online?
How do I check the status of my order?

steps.say:
Here are our guidelines for trade timelines.
General Guidelines:
Trade Date (T) + 2 business days
  • Stock/EFT
  • Mutual Fund
Trade Date + 1 business day
  • HISA
  • GIC purchase
  • GIC redemption before 11:00am
Note:Settlement dates may also vary for a specific security.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

adviceDirect gives you flexibility when settling trades in your account. You have the option of settling the trade with either Canadian or US dollars.

If you choose to apply a different settlement currency from market the security is traded, adviceDirect will convert enough funds to cover the entire amount of trade. Remember the Estimated Total Order Value is an approximation; the final exchange rate will be applied to your order at the end of the day when filled.

Please note that trades done in RESP Accounts can only be settled in Canadian dollars.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

Yes, if the deposit request was made through the adviceDirect platform, you can immediately place a trade online and accept the warning message that is presented prior to the final trade review.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

You can place equity, fixed income, and mutual fund orders online. For equity orders, you can place buy or sell at either markets or at limit price. You can also place stop orders on those markets which support this type of order. For a full list of FAQ related to trading and order types including stop orders, please visit the Education - FAQs - Trading page on the original experience.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

You can view the status of your orders by Signing in to your BMO InvestorLine account and selecting; My Portfolio > Transactions Or, if you're using the 2.0 experience, simply select Order Status Details below your Holdings summary and you will be re-directed.

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day
Great, can you tell me a little bit more about what you're looking for?

options.show: I have forgotten my BMO adviceDirect account password and/or trading password. What should I do?
I opened another account, however, I don't see it on my Client ID profile. What should I do?
How do I open a new account?

steps.say:
Ok, let me help you with that. To reset your password, go to your online investing sign in page and select the Forgot your Password link.
Reset my password

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

If you don't see your new account added to your Client ID within 2-3 business days, please call us and we will add it for you.
Forms and documents

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

You have lots of options when it comes to opening an account. You can apply online, call in to our sales line, or speak to someone in a branch or online.

Which online investing platform are you considering?

options.show: adviceDirect (Please note, adviceDirect requires a minimum deposit of $50,000)
Self-Directed (There's no minimum balance to open a Self-Directed account)
SmartFolio (Please note, SmartFolio requires a minimum deposit of $1,000)
I'm not sure yet

steps.say: Great, can you tell me a little bit more about what you're looking for?

options.show: I'm looking for my documents, such as statements, trade confirmations and tax documents
How can I submit documents electronically?
Where do I find additional forms?

steps.say:
Sign in to your adviceDirect account and select:- My Portfolio > eDocuments. If you are using the 2.0 experience, select More below your account summary and select e-Documents. You'll be redirected to the original site.
Log in

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

Sign in to your adviceDirect account and select 2.0
Select More below your account summary and select Document Upload. Select the account the document applies to, select the document you wish to upload and click Upload.
Log in

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

For adviceDirect, you can find your forms here.
Find Forms

Do you have more questions?

options.show: Yes!
Let me see the FAQs FAQs
No thanks, you've answered my question

steps.say: I'm happy to hear it, thanks for chatting and have a great day

Have a question? That's what we are here for. Send us your question using our secure messaging MyLink. Sign in and select MyLink from the Account Services menu.
Sign in
Give us a call, Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. (ET) at 1-888-776-6886

How long does it take to transfer assets into my account?

steps.say:
Funds can be deposited into SF by signing into your account and clicking on "Add Funds" or by giving us a call.

For full transfers, the easiest way to submit a request is to sign into your account online and click on "Add Funds". For partial requests, this can be done with our transfers form found on the Forms page.

Your transfer times vary depending on the institution and the investments being transferred. Here are our general guidelines for approximate transfer times once documentation is received:

    Within BMO:
  • BMO Nesbitt Burns:1 to 2 weeks
  • BMO Bank of Montreal:Cash or mutual funds:2 to 3 weeks
  • Guaranteed Investment Certificates (GICs):4 to 6 weeks
    ATON-Eligible Institutions:
  • Brokers using ATON(Account Transfer Online Notification):2 to 3 weeks (transfers of mutual funds may take longer)
    Non-ATON:
  • Non-ATON brokers:3 to 4 weeks GICs, Quebec savings bonds, mutual funds, and physical certificates may take longer
  • Pension transfer:6 to 8 weeks

options.show: Can I settle my trades in either Canadian or US currency?

steps.say:
You can settle your trades in Canadian dollars, as SmartFolio only holds CADS EFTs in our portfolio.

options.show: I'm looking for my documents, such as statements, trade confirmations and tax documents
Where do I find additional forms?

steps.say:
Sign in to your SmartFolio account and select:- My Portfolio > eDocuments. If you are using the 2.0 experience, select More below your account summary and select e-Documents. You'll be redirected to the original site.
